attributes.action: let all householders be informed of sex affenders be known to all. ie sex affenders that are rehomed near schools etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, as a parent,I should be informed that sex affenders are named or at least the neighbourhood should be notified of such people living in the area.If this country want to be part of the "up and coming world," then we should act as such.Why does this goverment seem to sweep these problems under the carpet? this is about a person who has wrecked a life,and gets a way with it scott free.Why are they not stronger laws? like abroad, what are the british goverment scared of ?My Daughter is Five years old, yet if a person does harm to her, They get statisfation, and as a parent what do we get,I will tell you, a complete and utter living hell. As a " caring goverment" do something.
